The time from when messages should be rerouted.
The format of this field is: HHMM
Where:
HH represents the hour in 24 hour time format.
MM represents the number of minutes past the hour.
This field is mandatory if ROUTE.TO has been set.
Mandatory input if ROUTE.TO has been set.
The Dispo Officer to whom messages should be rerouted for the dates and times specified in the DATE.FROM, DATE.TO, TIME.FROM, TIME.TO fields.
Once this field contains a valid Dispo Officer the fields: DATE.FROM, DATE.TO, TIME.FROM, TIME.TO will change from noinput fields back input fields
If the Dispo Officer is removed from this field, then the fields: DATE.FROM, DATE.TO, TIME.FROM, TIME.TO will revert back to being noinput fields, and the contents of the fields will be emptied.
